bill.title: Economic development; create the Mississippi Small Project Economic Development Financing Revolving Fund.
bill.description: An Act To Create The Mississippi Small Project Development Financing Revolving Fund To Provide Loans Or Grants To Local Governments And Certain Business Enterprises To Construct Or Otherwise Provide Certain Facilities; To Provide That The Fund Shall Be Administered By The Mississippi Development Authority; To Provide That Local Governments And Business Enterprises Desiring A Loan Or A Grant Must Submit An Application To The Mississippi Development Authority; To Provide For The Minimum Content Of Such Applications; To Authorize The Issuance Of General Obligation Bonds In The Amount Of $5,000,000.00 To Provide Funds For The Mississippi Small Project Development Financing Revolving Fund; And For Related Purposes.
